    • validCommand

      private boolean validCommand(String input)
      Check to see if command inputted is a valid executable command
      Parameters:
      input - String which will represent the command we will be testing for validity
      Returns:
      will return true (boolean) if input is listed in command array, otherwise false

    • validAdd

      private String validAdd(Event event, String[] input, EventCalendar calendar)
      Checker to see if given event can be added to the eventCalendar
      Parameters:
      event - the Event object we are planning to add and need to run checks for
      input - an array of strings representing a single line from system.in
      Returns:
      will return string indicating if given event is a valid event to add to calendar, if not will display error message

    • runAdd

      private String runAdd(EventCalendar calendar, String[] input)
      Creates event object extracted from command line input and adds it to EventCalendar events array
      Parameters:
      calendar - EventCalendar the calendar we will be adding an Event to
      input - an array of strings representing a single line from system.in
      Returns:
      will return string indicating if given event was added to the calendar. If not, will return String indicating why event is invalid

    • removeEvent

      private String removeEvent(EventCalendar calendar, String[] input)
      Removes specified event object from EventCalendar events array based off input command line
      Parameters:
      calendar - the calendar we will be removing an Event from
      input - an array of strings representing a single line from system.in
      Returns:
      will return string indicating if given event was removed to the calendar. If not, will return String indicating why removal could not occur

    • runCommand

      private String runCommand(String[] input, EventCalendar calendar)
      Given a command extracted from command line input, method will verify and run the specified command
      Parameters:
      input - an array of strings representing a single line from system.in
      calendar - EventCalendar the calendar we will be adding an Event to
      Returns:
      will return string indicating error or which command was successfully executed

    • run

      public void run()
      Method to extract information from standard input and execute commands void method used to in RunProject1 to process and execute commands based off standard input initiates scanner class and receives input from system.in
